name: Cymut X Mutrobo RPG
description: CYMUT X MUTROBO is an action RPG, become a trainer of Cymut and Mutrobo and live the experience of farming, picking up items, exploring a huge world, completing quests, capturing and evolving up to 60 Cymuts and 60 Mutrobos to collect and use in battle against multiple Cymuts and Mutrobos and 6 different bosses.
